37.eng-name: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: Jabir b. 'Abdullah reported that Allah's Messengor (ﷺ) said:There should be a bedding for a man. a bedding for his wife and the third one for the guest, and the fourth one is for the Satan

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ مَا زَادَ عَلَى الْحَاجَةِ مِنَ الْفِرَاشِ وَاللِّبَاسِ
chapter.eng-name: It Is Disliked To Have More Furniture And Bedding Than One Needs
